content.p:
ยง 21-1317. Budget.
 The Susquehanna river basin commission shall submit annually to the
Director of the Budget, in accordance with the rules and practices of
the state for study and consideration by such Director, an estimate of
monies required to administer, manage and support the commission during
the ensuing fiscal year. Such estimate shall include any request for
appropriation of funds by New York and shall be accompanied by a
tabulation of similar requests which the commission expects to make to
each signatory and the formula or factors upon which such respective
requests are based. The provisions of section 14.3 of the compact apply
to the budgetary and other fiscal matters related to the participation
of this state in the compact.
